name: No-Snake Hotel
description:
"Welcome, to the No-Snake Hotel, the only hotel with a 99.99% no-snake guarantee!  Here at the No-Snake Hotel we pride ourselves in our incomprehensible lack of snakes!"

'The No-Snake Hotel' was made by Two Star Games in 24 hours, over two days for an epic YouTube challenge.

  • 3-5 minute playtime.
  • No copyrighted music in game.
  • Standard WASD movement, and LMB interaction.
  • Definitely no snakes

If you enjoyed this game, be sure to wishlist and follow my other game Choo-Choo Charles on Steam!  Navigate an open-world island in an old train, upgrade it over time, and use it to fight an evil spider train named Charles.
